fields.name: IdentityClientId
fields.description: Null for SystemAssignedIdentity or Client Id for UserAssignedIdentity , which will be used to access key vault secret.

fields.name: LastStatus
fields.description: Last time sync and refresh status of secret from key vault.

fields.name: SecretIdentifier
fields.description: Key vault secret identifier for fetching secret. Providing a versioned secret will prevent auto-refresh. This requires API Management service to be configured with aka.ms/apimmsi
